headline: Is Fortinet (FTNT) Attractively Priced After Recent Share Price Weakness?
summary: If you are trying to figure out whether Fortinet is attractively priced or not, the current setup in the stock gives you plenty to think about. Fortinet shares last closed at US$75.75, with returns of 0.8% decline over 7 days, 7.3% decline over 30 days and 2.7% decline year to date, while the 1 year return sits at 22.9% decline and the 3 and 5 year returns are 46.3% and 159.7% respectively. Recent coverage around Fortinet has focused on its role in cybersecurity, with investors watching how...
